welcome.app_description: Connecting blind and sighted users to provide assistance

terms_and_conditions: I agree to the Terms and Conditions
password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password_uppercase: Password must include at least one uppercase letter
password_lowercase: Password must include at least one lowercase letter
password_number: Password must include at least one number
password_special: Password must include at least one special character
user_not_found: No user found with this email
password_reset_sent: Password reset link sent to your email
password_reset_failed: Failed to send password reset link
too_many_requests: Too many requests. Try again later
network_request_failed: Network error. Please check your connection
network_error: Network error. Please check your internet connection and try again.
network_timeout: Connection timed out. Please check your internet connection and try again.
null_user_error: Authentication returned null user. Please try again.
unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
user_disabled: This account has been disabled. Please contact support.
credential_already_in_use: This credential is already associated with another account.
requires_recent_login: This operation requires a more recent login. Please sign in again.
provider_already_linked: This account is already linked with another provider.
missing_google_auth_token: Google authentication failed. Please try again.
platform_exception: An issue occurred with your device. Please try again.
reset_password_description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
check_email_instructions: Please check your email and follow the instructions to reset your password.
voice_commands_description: Use the microphone button to control the app with your voice
navigation_help_description: Tap on locations to get detailed directions
navigation_description: Get assistance navigating to different locations by sending your location data to trusted contacts.
object_detection_description: Camera-based object detection to help identify items and obstacles in your surroundings.
emergency_description: Quickly contact your emergency contacts or services when you need immediate help.
person_upload_description: Upload images and details of people for recognition
voice_assistant_hint: Use the microphone button in the navigation bar
dark_mode_description: Use dark theme for better visibility at night
larger_text_description: Increase text size throughout the app
screen_reader_description: Enable voice feedback for screen elements
welcome_description: Your accessibility companion for navigation and daily assistance
password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters long
firebase_connection_error: Unable to connect to Firebase. Please check your internet connection and try again.
continue_as_guest_not_available: Guest login is not available at this time
don_t_have_account_sign_up: Don't have an account? Sign Up
logout_confirmation: Are you sure you want to logout?
voice_assistant_ready: Voice assistant is ready to use
voice_button_tap_to_start: Double tap to start voice commands
voice_button_tap_hint: Double tap to toggle voice listening
voice_button_help: This is the voice control button. Double tap to start or stop voice commands. Available commands include: navigate to home, read sensors, send location, and more.
voice_permission_denied: Voice permission was denied. Please enable microphone access in settings.
available_commands: Available commands are: go to home, settings, emergency, read sensors, and help
name: Name
show_qr_to_connect: Show your ID as QR code to connect with others
share_code_or_qr: Share this code or QR with a helper who wants to connect with you:
connect_with_me: Connect with me on Clarity using this code:
location_services_disabled: Location services are disabled. Please enable GPS.
enter_location_name: Enter a name for this location
voice_guidance_working: Voice guidance is working correctly. You are at
blind_user_needs_assistance: A blind user needs your immediate assistance.
blind_user_sent_emergency_alert: A blind user has sent an emergency alert. Please check immediately.
currency_detector_welcome: Welcome to Currency Detector. Tap the camera button to detect currency.
tap_to_detect: Tap the camera button to detect currency
camera_permission_denied: Camera permission denied. Please enable camera access in settings.
no_currency_detected: No currency detected in the image.
emergency_alerts_description: Notifications for emergency alerts from blind users
no_helper_linked: No helper linked with your account. Connect with a helper first.
failed_to_get_location: Failed to get your location. Please try again.
emergency_alert_sent: Emergency alert sent! Your helper has been notified.
emergency_button_description: Press the button below to send an emergency alert with your current location to your linked helper contact.
enable_camera_in_settings: Please enable camera access in settings
is_calling_you: is calling you. Would you like to answer?
disconnect_confirmation: Are you sure you want to disconnect? You will no longer be connected with this helper.
failed_to_disconnect: Failed to disconnect. Please try again.
no_helper_connected: No helper is connected. Please connect first.
could_not_fix_connection: Could not fix connection. Try reconnecting.
must_be_logged_in: You must be logged in to use this service
welcome_to_clarity_tap_logo: Welcome to Clarity. Tap the logo to activate voice assistant.
voice_assistant_activated: Voice assistant activated. How can I help you?
connect_to_helper_first: Please connect to a helper first
ai_chat_description: Chat with an AI assistant that can help answer your questions and provide information.
ai_assistant_welcome: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. How can I help you today?
gemini_assistant_welcome: Hello! I'm your Gemini AI assistant. How can I help you today?
clarity_assistant_welcome: Hello! I'm your Clarity AI assistant. How can I help you today?
clear_chat_confirmation: Are you sure you want to clear all chat messages?
ai_error_message: Sorry, I couldn't process your request. Please try again.
wake_word_prompt: Say Clarity to activate the assistant
wake_word_recognized: I'm listening. How can I help?
wake_word_mode_enabled: Wake word mode enabled. Say Clarity to activate
wake_word_mode_disabled: Wake word mode disabled. I'll listen for all commands
how_can_i_help: How can I help you today?
paper_scanner_description: Scan printed text from paper and hear it read aloud
point_camera_at_paper: Point your camera at the paper with text
no_text_found: No text was found in the image. Please try again
camera_permission_required: Camera permission is required to use this feature
blind_chat_orientation_portrait: Microphone button is at the top of the input area at the bottom of the screen. Tap it to speak a command or ask a question. Say help at any time for instructions.
blind_chat_orientation_landscape: Large microphone button is at the top of the input area on the right side of the screen. Camera and gallery buttons are below. Tap the mic to speak a command or ask a question.
no_speech_detected: No speech detected, please try again
did_not_understand: Sorry, I didn't understand that request. Please try again.
